description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a boost converter for stratospheric airship station-keeping propulsion. Input: 200V-400V from thin-film solar on envelope, Output: 600V DC bus at 50kW for electric thrusters. Must operate at 20km altitude (5% atmosphere), handle 24-hour day/night cycle, and provide 5-year endurance.

Design a Ćuk converter for superconducting gravimeter electronics. Input: 24V, Output: -5V at 1A for SQUID controller. Must achieve <1μGal noise contribution, operate at 4K cryogenic interface, and provide continuous years of recording.

Design a forward converter for geothermal well logging tool. Input: 200V DC from wireline, Output: 12V at 5A for electronics. Must operate at 300°C ambient, survive 3000 bar pressure, and withstand H2S corrosive environment.

Design a SEPIC converter for large mammal GPS tracking collar. Input: 3.6V from lithium primary (declining to 2.5V), Output: 3.3V at 200mA for GPS and satellite uplink. Must achieve 3-year tracking life, survive animal behavior (impact, water), and minimize collar mass.

Design a half-bridge converter for plasma gasification reactor arc power. Input: 480V 3-phase (rectified ~680V), Output: 200V at 500A for plasma torch. Must handle arc instability (millisecond current spikes), operate 24/7 in waste processing, and survive harsh thermal environment.

Design a buck converter for electron beam welding gun focus coil. Input: 300V from welding power supply, Output: 24V at 40A for focus/deflection coils. Must achieve <1μm beam positioning, operate in 10⁻⁴ torr vacuum, and handle 50kW reflected beam power during workpiece arcing.

Design a flyback converter for seismic P-wave early warning sensor. Input: 12V-24V from solar/battery, Output: 5V at 1A for accelerometer and radio. Must detect P-waves within 50ms of arrival, operate through M7+ earthquakes (2g shaking), and provide 99.99% uptime.

Design a full-bridge converter for superconducting ship propulsion motor. Input: 6.6kV AC (rectified ~9kV DC), Output: 4160V AC at 36MW for HTS motor. Must operate with cryogenic motor at 30K, handle motor flux pumping, and meet naval shock requirements.

Design a boost converter for fog/dew collection water harvester. Input: 6V-12V from thermoelectric generator, Output: 48V at 3A for Peltier coolers. Must operate on temperature differential (day/night), provide potable water in arid regions, and run maintenance-free for 3 years.

Design a Ćuk converter for silicon pixel detector in particle physics experiment. Input: 48V from counting room, Output: -1.8V at 100A total for 10,000 pixel chips. Must achieve <10mV ripple across all channels, survive 500 Mrad TID over detector lifetime, and provide per-channel adjustment.
